ticket.title: ActiveResource Format extension method should contain '.'
ticket.original-body:
I appreciate having the encoding strategy in the dedicated Format modules. Unfortunately is the dot not part of the extension method, but hardcoded in the elem_path method. That leads to an unnecessary inflexibility.
see also:
http://stackoverflow.com/questions/767203/how-to-remove-xml-and-json-from-url-when-using-active-resource
